comments.body: I love this body wash for my three babies! Lathers well, doesn’t hurt their eyes, and gentle on their sensitive skin. My five month old has very sensitive skin and it doesn’t irritate it or make it worse. Definitely buying again.

comments.body: Aveeno kids works great for those littles with sensitive skin. It leaves the skin moisturized and silky soft.

I've found Aveeno Kids Body Wash is not just for kids! It works great on Seniors sensitive skin. It's hypoallergenic, gently washes hands at the sink without drying out and chapping them. It also works great in the shower, having oat extract to clean without stripping the skin. Just lather and rinse. Works really well!
Like aveeno products and service from Amazon
It's sensitive to baby skin it is sensitive for my skin. Trustworthy brand! Lotion, shampoo, condones any and all products by aveeno are best! Recommend them all!!💯
We love the Aveeno brand because my daughter has sensitive, excema-prone skin. This wash always has her skin feeling soft & clean

I love this body wash for my three babies! Lathers well, doesn’t hurt their eyes, and gentle on their sensitive skin. My five month old has very sensitive skin and it doesn’t irritate it or make it worse. Definitely buying again.
Estaba buscando un jabón que rindiera, suave, que no reseque y sin olores fuertes y este lo cumple. Un poco de jabón rinde bastante para bañarla completa
Perfecto para el cabello curly de mi bebe de dos anos. y sobre todo no le irrita sus ojos. olor delicioso

I'm extremely cautious about the products I put on my toddler's skin. He has sensitive skin that often can turn into eczema in the winter. His normal body wash was out of stock so I decided to give this a try! I'm super impressed with the amount of product you get for the price! The bottle is much bigger in person. The scent was very clean and mild. It also was very gentle on his skin and didn't cause any irritation or itching, which is a common problem he has with body wash. We may just make this our go-to bath time wash! Definitely would recommend.

I I had assumed that this body wash was a Cream body wash unfortunately, it is only a gel. It doesn’t sud very much so you may be inclined to use more than two pumps. It’s gentle on the skin and easy for my 5yr old to wash her face without burning her eyes.
Good body wash for kids, no issues with skin!

I love this body wash for my three babies! Lathers well, doesn’t hurt their eyes, and gentle on their sensitive skin. My five month old has very sensitive skin and it doesn’t irritate it or make it worse. Definitely buying again.
My daughter was having issues with itching from other kids body washes. She did not complain once about this iching her skin. The smell is nice, her skin was soft, and very moisturizing.

Aveeno Body Wash offers a gentle and nourishing cleanse, but if you’re expecting a rich lather, this might not be the product for you. While it doesn’t foam up as much as some other body washes, I’ve found that it still effectively cleanses and leaves my skin feeling soft. If you prioritize a mild, hydrating wash over a bubbly lather, Aveeno Body Wash is worth considering for its soothing properties and skin-friendly ingredients

My son suffers from dry skin on his face and I noticed it once I started washing his face with Dove soap. I read about this product and decided to buy it; this cleared my son’s face in just 3 days of use. Would highly recommend; FYI my son is 6 years old and this works great on him.
My daughter loves this shower gel. This shower gel is perfect for her, It feels very soothing after washing. It's not very lathery, but I love the smell. Already repurchased twice.

I've found Aveeno Kids Body Wash is not just for kids! It works great on Seniors sensitive skin. It's hypoallergenic, gently washes hands at the sink without drying out and chapping them. It also works great in the shower, having oat extract to clean without stripping the skin. Just lather and rinse. Works really well!

So my 7 year old started getting these bumps on his skin that I started noticing around his elbow/upper arms and his back/belly and thighs and I thought maybe he just has sensitive skin and needs a special body wash so I ordered this. Ever since we started using it, all the bumps are gone and have stayed gone. 10/10 will be buying again.
My daughter's skin is very sensitive. This body wash was perfect for her. Very soothing. Great suds and nice scent. Would repurchase.
Our son has sensitive skin and this body wash is great. Doesn’t fell itch after shower and leaves his skin very soft.

My daughter is sensitive to scents and products. Some body washes dry her skin out and give her rashes. She really likes the scent of this one and now that she’s 7 and it’s a “face and body wash” she’s really happy about washing the grime off of her face after soccer games. It also doesn’t dry her skin out. She asked me to buy this again after it’s gone. I’d say that’s as good of a review as any.

I'm extremely cautious about the products I put on my toddler's skin. He has sensitive skin that often can turn into eczema in the winter. We may just make this our go-to bath time wash! Definitely would recommend.

I bought this for my 8 year old daughter she actually had her first pimple, it may have been from sunblock but I wanted something safe and non harsh. The Aveeno Kids Sensitive Skin Face & Body Wash with Oat Extract is a gentle, effective solution for not only young children with delicate skin but adults as well. Its soap-free formula, enriched with soothing oat extract, cleanses without causing dryness or irritation. Parents will appreciate its hypoallergenic properties, ensuring it's safe for daily use on both the face and body. The light, natural scent is pleasant without being overpowering, making bath time enjoyable for kids. Overall, this product excels in providing a mild, nurturing wash that respects sensitive skin, maintaining Aveeno's trusted reputation in skincare.

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for babies

reviews.body: The Aveeno Kids Sensitive Skin Face & Body Wash with Oat Extract is a gentle, effective solution for not only young children with delicate skin but adults as well. Its soap-free formula, enriched with soothing oat extract, cleanses without causing dryness or irritation. Parents will appreciate its hypoallergenic properties, ensuring it's safe for daily use on both the face and body. The light, natural scent is pleasant without being overpowering, making bath time enjoyable for kids. Overall, this product excels in providing a mild, nurturing wash that respects sensitive skin, maintaining Aveeno's trusted reputation in skincare.
It has pleasant smell and lathers well. Perfect for my son sensitive skin his skin feels so soft and hydrated. Definitely give it a try👍🏻

I'm extremely cautious about the products I put on my toddler's skin. He has sensitive skin that often can turn into eczema in the winter. His normal body wash was out of stock so I decided to give this a try! I'm super impressed with the amount of product you get for the price! The bottle is much bigger in person. The scent was very clean and mild. It also was very gentle on his skin and didn't cause any irritation or itching, which is a common problem he has with body wash. We may just make this our go-to bath time wash! Definitely would recommend.
